Exposes.name: child_lock
Exposes.label: Child lock
Exposes.description: Enables/disables physical input on the device

features.name: state
features.label: State
features.description: Enables/disables window detection on the device

Exposes.name: battery_low
Exposes.label: Battery low
Exposes.description: Indicates if the battery of this device is almost empty

features.name: local_temperature
features.label: Local temperature
features.description: Current temperature measured on the device

features.name: system_mode
features.label: System mode
features.description: Mode of this device, in the `heat` mode the TS0601 will remain continuously heating, i.e. it does not regulate to the desired temperature. If you want TRV to properly regulate the temperature you need to use mode `auto` instead setting the desired temperature.

features.name: local_temperature_calibration
features.label: Local temperature calibration
features.description: Offset to add/subtract to the local temperature

features.name: preset
features.label: Preset
features.description: Mode of this device (similar to system_mode)
